text: @ProjectLincoln @realDonaldTrump He's not just "stand[ing] in the middle of 5th Avenue and shoot[ing] somebody...", he stopped his covid19 response as soon as he learned POC are dying in greater numbers than whites! This is intentional! Whites who die are merely collateral damage in his war to become dictator.
